hibernate-mapping.query: select new rddto ( rd.RegisterNo ) from TLMORM00017 as rd where rd.RegisterNo=:registerNo and rd.Active = true

select new rddto ( rd.RegisterNo, rd.Dbank, rd.Type, rd.AccountNo, rd.Amount, rd.Name, rd.NRC, rd.Commission, rd.TlxCharges, rd.ToAccountNo, rd.ToName, rd.ToNRC, rd.ToAddress, rd.PhoneNo, rd.TestKey, rd.SettlementDate, rd.SourceBranchCode, rd.DateTime, rd.UserNo, rd.Budget, rd.Currency ) from TLMORM00017 as rd where (rd.ReceiptDate !=null and rd.ReceiptDate != '') and (rd.SendDate=null or rd.SendDate = '') and Convert(char(10),rd.DateTime,111) = Convert(char(10),:dateTime,111) and rd.Type='IBL' and rd.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and rd.Active=true order by rd.Dbank

select new rddto ( rd.RegisterNo, rd.Dbank, rd.Type, rd.AccountNo, rd.Amount, rd.Name, rd.NRC, rd.Commission, rd.TlxCharges, rd.ToAccountNo, rd.ToName, rd.ToNRC, rd.ToAddress, rd.PhoneNo, rd.TestKey, rd.SettlementDate, rd.SourceBranchCode, rd.DateTime, rd.UserNo, rd.Budget, rd.Currency ) from TLMORM00017 as rd where (rd.ReceiptDate !=null and rd.ReceiptDate != '') and (rd.SendDate=null or rd.SendDate = '') and Convert(char(10),rd.DateTime,111) = Convert(char(10),:datetime,111) and rd.Type='IBL' and rd.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and rd.Active=true order by rd.DateTime

select new rddto ( rd.RegisterNo, rd.Dbank, rd.Type, rd.AccountNo, rd.Amount, rd.Name, rd.NRC, rd.Commission, rd.TlxCharges, rd.ToAccountNo, rd.ToName, rd.ToNRC, rd.ToAddress, rd.PhoneNo, rd.TestKey, rd.SettlementDate, rd.SourceBranchCode, rd.DateTime, rd.UserNo, rd.Budget, rd.Currency ) from TLMORM00017 as rd where (rd.ReceiptDate !=null and rd.ReceiptDate != '') and (rd.SendDate=null or rd.SendDate = '') and rd.Type='IBL' and rd.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and Convert(char(10),rd.DateTime,111) = Convert(char(10),:datetime,111) and rd.Active=true order by rd.RegisterNo

select new rddto ( rd.RegisterNo, rd.Dbank, rd.AccountNo, rd.Amount, rd.Commission, rd.TlxCharges, rd.Name, rd.IncomeType, rd.TestKey, rd.CheckNo, rd.RDType, rd.AccountSign, rd.LoanSerial, rd.Currency ) from TLMORM00017 as rd where rd.SourceBranchCode=:sourceBranchCode and rd.Type=:type and YEAR(rd.DateTime) = YEAR(:todaydate) and MONTH(rd.DateTime) = MONTH(:todaydate) and DAY(rd.DateTime) = DAY(:todaydate) and rd.ReceiptDate= null and rd.Active=true order by rd.RegisterNo

select new rddto ( r.RegisterNo, r.DrawingNo, r.DraftNo, r.Dbank, r.Br_Alias, r.Type, r.AccountNo, r.Name, r.Address, r.NRC, r.CheckNo, r.ToAccountNo, r.ToName, r.ToNRC, r.ToAddress, r.TestKey, r.Amount, r.Commission, r.TlxCharges, r.DateTime, r.ReceiptDate, r.IncomeDate, r.RDType, r.IncomeType, r.AccountSign, r.UserNo, r.Budget, r.SendDate, r.LoanSerial, r.Deno_Status, r.PhoneNo, r.ToPhoneNo, r.Narration, r.UniqueId, r.SourceBranchCode, r.Currency, r.Channel, r.SettlementDate, r.Active, r.TS, r.CreatedDate, r.CreatedUserId, r.UpdatedDate, r.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00017 as r where r.SourceBranchCode=:sourceBranchCode and r.Type=:type and (r.ReceiptDate = null or r.ReceiptDate = '') and r.Active=true order by r.RegisterNo
update TLMORM00017 rd set rd.SendDate=:sendDate, rd.UpdatedUserId = :updateduserid, rd.UpdatedDate = :updateddate where rd.RegisterNo=:registerNo and rd.Active=true
select new rddto ( rd.TestKey ) from TLMORM00017 as rd where rd.RegisterNo=:registerNo and rd.Active = true

select new rddto ( rd.RegisterNo, rd.Currency, rd.Amount, rd.ToAccountNo, rd.ToName, rd.Name, rd.Dbank, rd.SourceBranchCode ) from TLMORM00017 as rd where Convert(char(10),rd.DateTime,111) = Convert(char(10),:datetime,111) and rd.Type = :type and rd.Dbank = :dbank and rd.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebr and (rd.SendDate != null and rd.SendDate != '') and rd.Active = true order by rd.RegisterNo

select new rddto( r.RegisterNo, r.DrawingNo, r.DraftNo, r.Dbank, r.Br_Alias, r.Type, r.AccountNo, r.Name, r.Address, r.NRC, r.CheckNo, r.ToAccountNo, r.ToName, r.ToNRC, r.ToAddress, r.TestKey, r.Amount, r.Commission, r.TlxCharges, r.DateTime, r.ReceiptDate, r.IncomeDate, r.RDType, r.IncomeType, r.AccountSign, r.UserNo, r.Budget, r.SendDate, r.LoanSerial, r.Deno_Status, r.PhoneNo, r.ToPhoneNo, r.Narration, r.UniqueId, r.SourceBranchCode, r.Currency, r.Channel, r.SettlementDate, r.Active, r.TS, r.CreatedDate, r.CreatedUserId, r.UpdatedDate, r.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00017 as r where (r.ReceiptDate!=null and r.ReceiptDate!='') and (r.IncomeDate!=null and r.IncomeDate!='') and convert(char(10),r.DateTime,111) between :qSDATE and :qEDATE and r.SourceBranchCode= :SourceBranchCode and r.Active = true

delete from TLMORM00017 as r where (r.ReceiptDate!=null and r.ReceiptDate!='') and (r.IncomeDate!=null and r.IncomeDate!='') and convert(char(10),r.DateTime,111) between :qSDATE and :qEDATE and r.SourceBranchCode= :SourceBranchCode and r.Active = true

select new rddto( r.RegisterNo, r.DrawingNo, r.DraftNo, r.Dbank, r.Br_Alias, r.Type, r.AccountNo, r.Name, r.Address, r.NRC, r.CheckNo, r.ToAccountNo, r.ToName, r.ToNRC, r.ToAddress, r.TestKey, r.Amount, r.Commission, r.TlxCharges, r.DateTime, r.ReceiptDate, r.IncomeDate, r.RDType, r.IncomeType, r.AccountSign, r.UserNo, r.Budget, r.SendDate, r.LoanSerial, r.Deno_Status, r.PhoneNo, r.ToPhoneNo, r.Narration, r.UniqueId, r.SourceBranchCode, r.Currency, r.Channel, r.SettlementDate, r.Active, r.TS, r.CreatedDate, r.CreatedUserId, r.UpdatedDate, r.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00017 as r where (r.ReceiptDate!=null and r.ReceiptDate!='') and (r.IncomeDate!=null and r.IncomeDate!='') and (r.DateTime!=null and r.DateTime!='') and r.SourceBranchCode= :SourceBranchCode and r.Active = true

delete from TLMORM00017 as r where (r.ReceiptDate!=null and r.ReceiptDate!='') and (r.IncomeDate!=null and r.IncomeDate!='') and (r.DateTime!=null and r.DateTime!='') and r.SourceBranchCode= :SourceBranchCode and r.Active = true

select new rddto ( rd.RegisterNo, rd.Currency, rd.Amount, rd.ToAccountNo, rd.ToName, rd.Name, rd.Dbank, rd.SourceBranchCode, rd.Br_Alias, rd.Type
) from TLMORM00017 as rd where rd.RegisterNo = :registerNo and rd.Active = true

update TLMORM00017 rd set rd.RegisterNo=:registerNo2, rd.SendDate=:sendDate, rd.UpdatedUserId = :updateduserid, rd.UpdatedDate = :updateddate where rd.RegisterNo=:registerNo1 and rd.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and rd.Active=true

update TLMORM00017 rd set rd.RegisterNo = :modifyRegisterNo, rd.UpdatedUserId=:updatedUserId, rd.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate where rd.RegisterNo = :registerNo and rd.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and rd.Active = true

select new rddto( r.RegisterNo, r.DrawingNo, r.DraftNo, r.Dbank, r.Br_Alias, r.Type, r.AccountNo, r.Name, r.Address, r.NRC, r.CheckNo, r.ToAccountNo, r.ToName, r.ToNRC, r.ToAddress, r.TestKey, r.Amount, r.Commission, r.TlxCharges, r.DateTime, r.ReceiptDate, r.IncomeDate, r.RDType, r.IncomeType, r.AccountSign, r.UserNo, r.Budget, r.SendDate, r.LoanSerial, r.Deno_Status, r.PhoneNo, r.ToPhoneNo, r.Narration, r.UniqueId, r.SourceBranchCode, r.Currency, r.Channel, r.SettlementDate, r.Active, r.TS, r.CreatedDate, r.CreatedUserId, r.UpdatedDate, r.UpdatedUserId ) from TLMORM00017 as r where r.RegisterNo = :registerNo and r.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and r.Active = true

update TLMORM00017 rd set rd.Name = :name, rd.NRC = :nrc, rd.Address = :address, rd.PhoneNo = :phoneNo, rd.Narration = :narration, rd.ToAccountNo = :toAccountNo, rd.ToName = :toName, rd.ToNRC = :toNRC, rd.ToAddress = :toAddress, rd.ToPhoneNo = :toPhoneNo, rd.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, rd.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where rd.RegisterNo = :registerNo and rd.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and rd.Active = true

update TLMORM00017 rd set rd.Active = false, rd.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, rd.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where rd.RegisterNo = :registerNo and rd.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and rd.Active = true

update TLMORM00017 rd set rd.TestKey = :testKey, rd.Amount = :amount, rd.Commission = :commission, rd.TlxCharges = :tlxCharges, rd.IncomeType = :incomeType, rd.AccountNo = :accountNo, rd.Name = :name, rd.NRC = :nrc, rd.Address = :address, rd.CheckNo = :checkNo, rd.PhoneNo = :phoneNo, rd.Narration = :narration, rd.AccountSign = :acSign, rd.RDType = :rdType, rd.Deno_Status = :deno_status, rd.ReceiptDate = null, rd.IncomeDate = null, rd.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, rd.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where rd.RegisterNo = :registerNo and rd.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and rd.Active = true

update TLMORM00017 rd set rd.ReceiptDate=:receiptDate, rd.IncomeDate=:incomeDate, rd.SettlementDate=:settlementDate, rd.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, rd.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where rd.RegisterNo=:registerNo and rd.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBranch and rd.Active=true

select new rddto ( rd.RegisterNo, rd.Dbank, rd.Type, rd.AccountNo, rd.Amount, rd.Name, rd.NRC, rd.Commission, rd.TlxCharges, rd.ToAccountNo, rd.ToName, rd.ToNRC, rd.Address, rd.PhoneNo, rd.TestKey, rd.SettlementDate, rd.SourceBranchCode, rd.DateTime, rd.UserNo, rd.Budget, rd.Currency ) from TLMORM00017 as rd where rd.RegisterNo in (select d.AccountType from TLMORM00009 as d where d.GroupNo=:groupno and d.SourceBranchCode=:sourcebr and d.Active=true) and rd.SourceBranchCode=:sourcebr and rd.Active=true

select new rddto ( rd.RegisterNo, rd.Name, rd.NRC, rd.Address, (rd.Amount+rd.Commission+rd.TlxCharges) as Amount ) from TLMORM00017 as rd ,TLMORM00009 as d where rd.RegisterNo = d.AccountType and d.GroupNo = :groupno and d.Reverse_Status = false and rd.SourceBranchCode=:sourcebr and rd.Active= true

update TLMORM00017 rd set rd.Deno_Status=:denostatus, rd.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, rd.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where rd.RegisterNo = :registerNo and rd.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebr and rd.Active = true
